name: Indie Retro Brisca
description:
Let's play...

Indie Retro Brisca !

Brisca is a Mediterranean trick-taking card game for two players.

Rules:
  1. First of all, three cards are dealt to each player.
  2. The next card is uncovered in the center of the board. It's color is the "triumph" color.
  3. The cards values are these:
    • A: 11 points.
    • 3: 10 points.
    • K: 4 points.
    • Q: 3 points.
    • J: 2 points.
  4. Taking turns, each player throws a card. The player who threw the highest "triumph" wins that round.
  5. If there's no "triumph" card, that round will win the player who threw the highest card of the first color played that round.
  6. If the "triumph" card is either an A, 3, K, Q or J, the player in possession of the 7 with the same color can swap the "triumph" card.
  7. If the "triumph" card is either a 7, 6, 5 or 4, the player in possession of the 2 with the same color can swap the "triumph" card.
  8. After every round, the players take one card from the deck. The player who won the last round starts the next one.
  9. After the deck is empty, the player with more points will win the game !

You need to forward port 8000 (TCP) to your computer to host a game.
